name: Escape Zone
description:
Escape Zone is bringing you unique challenges! You have to find the hints to solve
the riddle and escape from the room within the limited time, or you will have to bear an inconceivable aftermath! In this game you can enjoy it both physically and realistically. To overcome the challenge, you will need a good match of wisdom, physical strength and mentality level. If you are a person who likes answering riddles, solving complex puzzles, or just generally clever and looking for a challenge, this event is for you.
 
Apart from the sophisticatedly designed rooms, the delicate scenarios involved enable players to imitate the roles in movie stories. Over 10,000,000 participants have played this game in Japan, China, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Singapore, and the United States. An extraordinary escape game with brand new experience is now in town!!This game requires you to escape from a place filled with puzzles to stump you and your fellow players. The objective of the game is to find and solve the mystery in order to escape within the time allotted.
